DRDO Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 09:49 IST
 Defence Research and Development Organisation
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

The Defence Research and Development Organization (DRDO) has published the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/M. Tech. in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the DRDO Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection Process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in interview at the given venue. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Telangana.

DRDO Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Junior Research Fellow 	01	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering

Age Limit for the DRDO Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 28 years.
Age relaxation is applicable as per norms.

Selectio Process for the DRDO Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the DRDO Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the DRDO Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the DRDO Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the walk-in at the given address below.

Venue

DRDO Young Scientists Laboratory for Smart Materials (DYSL-SM), AMTL Campus (near DMRL), KANCHANBAGH, HYDERABAD-500058

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	26-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
